title: WorldRadio: A Radio Station Website
description: WorldRadio is a radio station website that allows users to listen to radio stations from around the world.
shortDescription: WorldRadio is a radio station website that allows users to listen to radio stations from around the world.

title: MyHomeTechVerse
description: A full-stack modern **E-commerce Platform** featuring a dedicated **Admin Dashboard** for comprehensive product, order, and user management.
shortDescription: A full-stack modern **E-commerce Platform** featuring a dedicated **Admin Dashboard** for comprehensive product, order, and user management.

title: Web motions
description: developed Web Motions, a showcase of advanced, performant web animations and sophisticated UI/UX effects. Using Framer Motion and GSAP, I engineered complex motion sequencing optimized for smooth 60fps transitions. The application is built on Next.js to ensure superior routing and rendering performance, demonstrating strong technical skill in integrating complex visuals with modern architecture.
shortDescription: developed Web Motions, a showcase of advanced, performant web animations and sophisticated UI/UX effects. Using Framer Motion and GSAP, I engineered complex motion sequencing optimized for smooth 60fps transitions. The application is built on Next.js to ensure superior routing and rendering performance, demonstrating strong technical skill in integrating complex visuals with modern architecture.

title: MovieFlix
shortDescription: Simple movie info website powered by TMDB API useful for discovering movies
description: MovieFlix is a feature-rich movie information website that leverages the power of The Movie Database (TMDB) API to provide users with a comprehensive and user-friendly platform for exploring and discovering movies.

title: ProductVideoExample - Landing Page
shortDescription: A landing page to practice my core CSS skills.
description: I made this website to practice my core CSS skills. This was a template that I found and tried to recreate it exactly how it looked.
